subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Transit Systems
Citizens Bank Park (Philadelphia, Pa)
lead_paragraph: If you have a little under four hours, about $25 and a little patience, you can get from Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia to Yankee Stadium in the Bronx.
snippet: If you have a little under four hours, about $25 and a little patience, you can get from Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia to Yankee Stadium in the Bronx.
